Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Riverdell Way, between the Rodaisal Community Housing Complex on the west and the Iilandi University on the east.
Room.LongDescription: The Rodaisal Community Housing Complex provides simple, communal housing for most of the population who choose to live within the city of Oceancrest. Individual housing is impossible in the city due to the lack of free space, so these large complexes were built to give people a place to live.
